job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Required Skills:Expert in MySQL and one or more of the following: Oracle, Mongodb, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQL, Kafka, Hadoop, Hbase or Hive Experience in Kafka for at least 1 year is Must. Bachelor's degree in computer science or Information TechnologyExpert in database and SQL tuning Expert trouble-shooter Authored software to do parts or all of your jobStrong Shell, Python and SQL scripting to automate DB related jobs  Familiarity with observability tools such as Grafana, Prometheus, Vividcortex, Solarwinds, Nagios, Icinga, Munin, Cacti, WiresharkAbility to work with development teams Familiarity with low level debugging tools: strace, tcpdump, gdb, lsof and netstat Familiarity with Splunk Expertise in setting up and testing backups  Responsibilities:Respond to issues within the Service Level Objective during your assigned on-call rotationSupport 1 of 2 of these tracks of technologyKafka, ElasticSearch+LogStash+Kibana and RabbitMQMySQL, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQLWrite software to improve the reliability, scalability and performance of Client’s infrastructureTroubleshoot broken systems and services issues
